Census Datasets

Pre-loaded census data

Census 1961 literacy data
census_1971
Census 1971 Primary Census Abstract
census_1981
Census 1981 Primary Census Abstract

Census 2011 Primary Census Abstract (PCA)
census_2011_mother_tongue
Census 2011 Mother Tongue Data (C-16)

Census population time series (1901-2011)
census_subdistricts_2011
Subdistrict Directory with 2011 Census Data
census_variables
Census Variables Lookup
india_states
Indian States Lookup

Census Data Access

Retrieve census datasets programmatically

get_census()
Get India Census Data

Geographic Boundaries

Work with administrative boundaries

get_census_boundaries()
Get census boundaries
attach_geometry()
Attach geographic boundaries to census data
clear_geometry_cache()
Clear geometry cache

Mapping & Visualization

Create choropleth maps

plotting
Plotting functions for census data
plot_map()
Creates a choropleth map from census data with sensible defaults.
compare_maps()
Compare maps across years
get_palette()
Get color palette
